tags: Scores higher for more recent notes by targetPubkey (simple heuristic).
content:
--RELATR
cap notes = nostr.query {kinds: [1], authors: [_.targetPubkey], limit: 20}
--RELATR

let
  events = fetch(_.provisioned, .notes) | [],
  n = length(events)
in
if n > 10 then 0.9
else if n > 5 then 0.7
else if n > 0 then 0.4
else 0.0
